ResourceHeader.ResourceName: INT-AUR MEMO DMA N2 : AC E and B waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) High Resolution
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains non continuous high resolution calibrated wave form of the AC electric and magnetic fields in several frequency bands (50 Hz up to 240 kHz) from the MEMO DMA instrument of the Interball-Auroral probe.
A calibration file has been applied to calculate the data in physical values. The data have been transformed in physical value using first the Fourier transform and second the calibration in amplitude and phase coefficient has been applied. An inverse Fourier transform is performed again to calculate the waveform in physical value.

Parameter.Name: AC E waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) High Resolution
Parameter.Description: INT-AUR MEMO calibrated data of the electric field in three directions High Resolution

Parameter.Name: AC B waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) High Resolution
Parameter.Description: INT-AUR MEMO calibrated data of the magnetic field in three directions High Resolution
